name: Dado
description:
Match the your Dado blocks with falling ones.

It's super addicting, and super casual.

Watch out for the special types of blocks that will change the speed of spinning, and the direction...

Hold down left click to stop spinning, or you can also hold down 'Space' on the keyboard!

How high will you build?

Mobile version: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.juunoco.dado
